title: Blue essence multiplier

embed.description: In this video, find out about the big changes coming to League of Legends this preseason, like Runes Reforged, updates to the progression system, and changes in in-game currencies, along with introducing veteran rewards and the new Essence Emporium. Note: The BE Multiplier in this video is for the SG/MY server.

body:
Hi,
It was said that our current blue essence would be multiplied by 6.5 and added to our new blue essence count with the preseason but in this video it is 17.8 this doesn't seem like a typo but the 6.5 factor has been confirmed by rioters so which is it?

replies.body: at last something explain a little bit about what we need to know but how to gain BE it's not counting any more

Singapore and Malaysia are a part of the Garena servers which are completely separate from the rest of the League servers. They have some differences, the Blue Essence conversion rate being one major one at that. I know it really sucks to hear in this case, but Our servers won't always operate the same way as Garena's. 

It looks like Garena servers have a 17.8 conversion rate, but the normal servers outside of Garena have a 6.5 conversion rate.
How long will the BE store be up(specifically URFwick)?

That sounds a biiiit unfair, 

With 17.8 multiplier i would have enough BE for URFwick And a Gemstone (and other stuff)

Now i only have a Gemstone
